display_long_description:
Welcome to The Vacant Beta, an intense VR survival horror experience where every decision matters—and your feedback drives the future of the game! 

This is an early development version, and we need YOU to help shape it! 

-Survive the Waves: Each round, you'll fight off Vacants, scavenge for fuses to unlock the safe room, and buy weapons using DNA collected from the arena. With limited resources and nowhere to hide, every second is a battle for survival. 

-Your Feedback Shapes the Game: This beta is just the beginning. We want to hear from you—what’s working, what’s terrifying, and what needs to change. Join our Discord community to report bugs, suggest features, and vote on future content. The more you play and share, the better the final version will be! 

-Frequent Updates & Improvements: Based on player feedback, we’ll be rolling out regular updates, tweaking gameplay, and adding new content. This is your chance to be part of game development in real time! 

-Get Ready to Survive: This is The Vacant Beta. It’s fun. It’s immersive. And it’s only getting better. Are you ready to face the horde?

-Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/PwF3mqcB5V
